column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////- Spicy Chicken Ramen ($11.50): Mildly spicy broth with flat pieces of chicken breast
column5: and thin noodles. The ramen and it's ingredients were all very well made and mixed nicely with each other
column6: no complaints. The broth was very warm and soft to the tongue
column8: it really gave the Ramen an extra kick.
